trends: There have been 74 other sightings in Stephenville
There were 6 other sightings in Stephenville on or around October 23rd 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in the house working. My son had a number of his football team friend over for a party. Some were inside and he was with some outside playing basketball. I heard him yelling for me to get the camera there was something outside. I got the camera and ran outside. It was then I saw the lights. there were 3 orange rectangular lights. They looked like they were attached to something, but I couldn't tell what the object looked like. The lights were vertical and had a space between them. The lights were high in the sky and I don't know how far away they were. The lights did not blink, they were steady. My son took the video of the lights until the vanished. It all lasted about 3 minutes. We also noticed that there were jets in the area.
Summary: My son was outside with several of his friends when he started yelling and for me to get my digital camera. I got the camera and ran outside with it. When I got outside I saw 3 rectangle lights in the sky.
